Name: Grive2
Overview: Backup your files to Google Drive using Grive2 client in a docker container

CLIENT_ID.Name: CLIENT_ID
CLIENT_ID.Description: Your Client ID obtained by doing the procedure in the description

SECRET.Name: SECRET
SECRET.Description: Your Client Secret obtained by doing the procedure in the description

CODE.Name: CODE
CODE.Description:
Your client secret obtained from the URL in the description
Delete me after the setup is complete

GRIVE_PARAMS.Name: GRIVE_PARAMS
GRIVE_PARAMS.Description: Passes parameters to grive2. For example -s my_drive_folder. See https://github.com/agusalex/grive2docker#grive-settings

CRON.Name: CRON
CRON.Description: Crontab schedule to run this container, use this to generate it: https://crontab.guru/

PERMISSIONS.Name: PERMISSIONS
PERMISSIONS.Description: The UNIX permissions to apply to all files in the folder after sync. This will override any permissions you already have.

UNRAID_FOLDER.Name: UNRAID_FOLDER
UNRAID_FOLDER.Description: Path to the unraid folder in which to sync the files, it also will contain .grive config file
